name: Regions of Ruin: Sieges
summary:
Do you want more Regions of Ruin? Did you feel you wanted to add Siege mechanics to the game? New characters, companions, and loot? Then this is your DLC!

Introducing the Regions of Ruin Sieges DLC which includes :
- 7 New siege event areas
- 2 New mercenary types for hire
- New building (Training Ground)
- Loads'o'loot
- Greatly upgrade companions
- Repeatedly challenge yourself with sieges to earn unending loot and rewards
- Hire new companions to help in the fray and from afar
